014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
017import java.lang.constant.Constable;
018import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
019import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
020
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.Objects;
023import java.util.Optional;
024
025import javax.lang.model.element.VariableElement;
026
027import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
028
029import org.microbean.lang.Lang;
030import org.microbean.lang.Lang.SameTypeEquality;
031
032import org.microbean.lang.element.DelegatingElement;
033
034import org.microbean.qualifier.NamedAttributeMap;
035
036import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
037
038import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_BeanSelectionCriteria;
039import static org.microbean.bean.ConstantDescs.CD_Dependency;
040
041import static org.microbean.lang.ConstantDescs.CD_VariableElement;
042
043/**
044 * A dependency that a given type has on some other qualified type.
045 *
046 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson/" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
047 */
048public final class Dependency implements Constable {
049
050
051  /*
052   * Instance fields.
053   */
054
055
056  private final BeanSelectionCriteria bsc;
057
058  private final DelegatingElement e;
059
060
061  /*
062   * Constructors.
063   */
064
065
066  /**
067   * Creates a new {@link Dependency}.
068   *
069   * @param a an {@link Assignability}; may be {@code null} in which case a default {@link Assignability} will be used
070   * instead
071   *
072   * @param attributes a {@link List} of {@link NamedAttributeMap}s; must not be {@code null}
073   *
074   * @param box whether or not to box primitive types
075   *
076   * @param e a {@link VariableElement} whose {@link VariableElement#getKind() kind} property is {@link
077   * javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#FIELD FIELD} or {@link javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#PARAMETER
078   * PARAMETER}; must not be {@code null}
079   *
080   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code e}'s {@link javax.lang.model.element.Element#getKind() kind} property
081   * is neither {@link javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#FIELD FIELD} nor {@link
082   * javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#PARAMETER PARAMETER}
083   *
084   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code attributes} or {@code e} is {@code null}
085   */
086  public Dependency(Assignability a,
087                    final List<? extends NamedAttributeMap<?>> attributes,
088                    final boolean box,
089                    final VariableElement e) {
090    super();
091    if (a == null) {
092      a = new Assignability();
093    }
094    this.e = DelegatingElement.of(e, a.typeAndElementSource());
095    this.bsc = new BeanSelectionCriteria(a, this.e.asType(), List.copyOf(attributes), box);
096    switch (this.e.getKind()) {
097    case FIELD:
098    case PARAMETER:
099      break;
100    default:
101      throw new IllegalArgumentException("e: " + e);
102    }
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Creates a new {@link Dependency}.
107   *
108   * @param bsc a {@link BeanSelectionCriteria}; must not be {@code null}
109   *
110   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code bsc} is {@code null}
111   *
112   * @see #Dependency(BeanSelectionCriteria, VariableElement)
113   */
114  public Dependency(final BeanSelectionCriteria bsc) {
115    this(bsc, null);
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Creates a new {@link Dependency}.
120   *
121   * @param bsc a {@link BeanSelectionCriteria}; must not be {@code null}; its {@link BeanSelectionCriteria#type() type}
122   * property will be ignored in favor of the type encapsulated by the supplied {@link VariableElement} argument
123   * instead, if that argument is non-{@code null}
124   *
125   * @param e a {@link VariableElement} representing a field or executable parameter; may be {@code null}; if non-{@code
126   * null}, must have a {@link javax.lang.model.element.Element#getKind() kind} property whose value is either {@link
127   * javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#FIELD FIELD} or {@link javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#PARAMETER
128   * PARAMETER}
129   *
130   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code e} is non-{@code null} and {@code e}'s {@link
131   * javax.lang.model.element.Element#getKind() kind} property is neither {@link
132   * javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#FIELD FIELD} nor {@link javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind#PARAMETER
133   * PARAMETER}
134   *
135   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code bsc} is {@code null}
136   */
137  public Dependency(final BeanSelectionCriteria bsc, final VariableElement e) {
138    super();
139    if (e == null) {
140      this.e = null;
141      this.bsc = Objects.requireNonNull(bsc, "bsc");
142    } else {
143      final Assignability a = bsc.assignability();
144      this.e = DelegatingElement.of(e, a.typeAndElementSource());
145      this.bsc = new BeanSelectionCriteria(a, e == null ? bsc.type() : e.asType(), bsc.attributes(), bsc.box());
146      switch (this.e.getKind()) {
147      case FIELD:
148      case PARAMETER:
149        break;
150      default:
151        throw new IllegalArgumentException("e: " + e);
152      }
153    }
154  }
155
156
157  /*
158   * Instance methods.
159   */
160
161
162  /**
163   * Returns the {@link BeanSelectionCriteria} associated with this {@link Dependency}.
164   *
165   * <p>This method never returns {@code null}.
166   *
167   * @return the {@link BeanSelectionCriteria} associated with this {@link Dependency}; never {@code null}
168   */
169  public final BeanSelectionCriteria beanSelectionCriteria() {
170    return this.bsc;
171  }
172
173  /**
174   * Returns the {@link VariableElement} associated with this {@link Dependency}, or {@code null}.
175   *
176   * @return the {@link VariableElement} associated with this {@link Dependency}, or {@code null}
177   */
178  public final VariableElement element() {
179    return this.e;
180  }
181
182  @Override // Constable
183  public final Optional<DynamicConstantDesc<Dependency>> describeConstable() {
184    return Lang.describeConstable((VariableElement)this.e)
185      .flatMap(eDesc -> this.bsc.describeConstable()
186               .map(bscDesc -> DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
187                                                      MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(CD_Dependency,
188                                                                                     CD_BeanSelectionCriteria,
189                                                                                     CD_VariableElement),
190                                                      bscDesc,
191                                                      eDesc)));
192  }
193
194  @Override // Object
195  public final int hashCode() {
196    int hashCode = 17;
197    hashCode = 37 * hashCode + this.beanSelectionCriteria().hashCode();
198    hashCode = 37 * hashCode + this.element().hashCode();
199    return hashCode;
200  }
201
202  @Override // Object
203  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
204    if (other == this) {
205      return true;
206    } else if (other != null && other.getClass() == this.getClass()) {
207      final Dependency her = (Dependency)other;
208      return
209        Objects.equals(this.beanSelectionCriteria(), her.beanSelectionCriteria()) &&
210        Objects.equals(this.element(), her.element());
211    } else {
212      return false;
213    }
214  }
215
216}
